text: geia ga inu nia waini a God, go nia waini maaloo o dono hagawelewele, dela ne dui go Mee gi lodo di ibu o dono hagawelewele! Digau huogodoo ma ga inu nia waini aanei, le e haga mmaemmae i lodo di ahi ‘sulfur’ wele ngongoaa i mua digau di langi haga madagu mo Tama siibi.14.10 Isaiah 51.17; Genesis 19.24; Ezekiel 38.22
